section.l2configs.modulargolems.server.toml.title: 模块化傀儡 - 服务端配置

modulargolems.configuration.title: 模块化傀儡 - 配置
modulargolems.configuration.l2complements: 莱特兰扩充 - 兼容配置
modulargolems.configuration.twilightforest: 暮色森林 - 兼容配置
modulargolems.configuration.botania: 植物魔法 - 兼容配置
modulargolems.configuration.create: 机械动力 - 兼容配置
modulargolems.configuration.allowEditCuriosForOthers: Allow command wand to edit curios of other mobs you own
modulargolems.configuration.barehandRetrieve: Allow players to retrieve the golems by bare hand
modulargolems.configuration.doEnemyAggro.tooltip: Make mobs aggro to iron golem automatically aggro to modular golems
modulargolems.configuration.maxWanderRadius: Max golem activity radius before being teleported back
modulargolems.configuration.retrieveDistance: Max distance to retrieve single golem
modulargolems.configuration.retrieveRange: Max distance to retrieve all golems
modulargolems.configuration.riddenSpeedFactor: Speed factor for dog golem when ridden by entities
modulargolems.configuration.startFollowRadius.tooltip:
Max golem activity radius before following player in follow mode
Range: 1.0 ~ 100.0
modulargolems.configuration.stopWanderRadius.tooltip:
Max golem activity radius before willing to go back to origin in wander mode
Range: 1.0 ~ 100.0
modulargolems.configuration.strictInteract.tooltip:
When enabled, the following features will be disabled when player holds item in hand:
- give item to golem or take items from golem by right click
- order dog golem to seat
modulargolems.configuration.summonDistance: Max distance to summon single golem
modulargolems.configuration.targetResetTime: Target reset time after no movement, in ticks
modulargolems.configuration.basePickupRange: Pickup range per level for pickup upgrade
modulargolems.configuration.explosionResistance: Percentage damage reduction per level of explosion resistance
modulargolems.configuration.magicResistance: Percentage damage reduction per level of magic resistance
modulargolems.configuration.thorn: Percentage damage reflection per level of thorn
modulargolems.configuration.thunderHeal: Healing when thunder immune golems are striked
modulargolems.configuration.mendingXpCost: Mending Xp Cost per health point
modulargolems.configuration.carminiteTime: Time for the golem to be invincible (in ticks) per level of carminite
modulargolems.configuration.compatTFDamage: Percentage damage bonus per level of twilight damage
modulargolems.configuration.compatTFHealing: Percentage healing bonus per level of twilight healing
modulargolems.configuration.fiery: Percentage damage addition per level of fiery
modulargolems.configuration.mechAttack: Attack boost per level of Mechanical Force
modulargolems.configuration.mechMaxFuel: Maximum number of fuel item that can be added at the same time
modulargolems.configuration.mechSpeed: Speed boost per level of Mechanical Mobility
modulargolems.configuration.coating: Damage absorbed per level of coating
modulargolems.configuration.conduitBoostArmor: Conduit modifier boosts armor when golem is in water
modulargolems.configuration.conduitBoostAttack: Conduit modifier boosts attack (percentage) when golem is in water
modulargolems.configuration.conduitBoostReduction: Conduit modifier reduce damage taken when golem is in water (multiplicative)
modulargolems.configuration.conduitBoostSpeed: Conduit modifier boosts speed (percentage) when golem is in water
modulargolems.configuration.conduitBoostToughness: Conduit modifier boosts toughness when golem is in water
modulargolems.configuration.teleportCooldown: Teleport cooldown in ticks for avoiding physical damage
modulargolems.configuration.targetDamageBonus: Damage bonus for attacking specific type of enemy
modulargolems.configuration.manaBoostingCost: Mana boosting cost per level (of 1 hit)
modulargolems.configuration.manaBoostingDamage: Percentage damage bonus per level of mana boost
modulargolems.configuration.manaBurstDamage: Damage of magic burst as percentage of attack damage
modulargolems.configuration.pixieAttackProb: Probability of summoning a pixie when attacking
modulargolems.configuration.pixiecounterattackProb: Probability of summoning a pixie when attacked
